name: SCNTransparencyMode
desc: The modes SceneKit uses to calculate the opacity of pixels rendered with a material, used by the transparencyMode property.

items.name: case aOne
items.desc: SceneKit derives transparency information from the alpha channel of colors. The value 1.0 is opaque.

items.name: case rgbZero
items.desc: SceneKit derives transparency information from the luminance of colors. The value 0.0 is opaque.
